headline.main: Hundreds of Arizona Inmates to Be Moved Following Riot
headline.print_headline: Hundreds of Arizona Inmates to Be Moved Following Riot

docs.snippet: About 700 inmates at an Arizona prison were being moved to new locations Friday after disturbances on consecutive days left their housing units uninhabitable....
docs.lead_paragraph: About 700 inmates at an Arizona prison were being moved to new locations Friday after disturbances on consecutive days left their housing units uninhabitable.

headline.main: Peru Clinches Copa Third Place Again
headline.print_headline: Guerrero on Target as Peru Clinch Copa Third Place Again

docs.snippet: Striker Paolo Guerrero scored his fourth goal of the Copa America on Friday as Peru beat Paraguay 2-0 to finish in third place for the second consecutive edition of the tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: Striker Paolo Guerrero scored his fourth goal of the Copa America on Friday as Peru beat Paraguay 2-0 to finish in third place for the second consecutive edition of the tournament.

headline.main: New Credit Suisse CEO Promises 'Ruthlessly Selective' Review-FT
headline.print_headline: New Credit Suisse CEO Promises 'Ruthlessly Selective' Review-FT

docs.snippet: Newly appointed Credit Suisse AG Chief Executive Tidjane Thiam, in an interview with the Financial Times, promised a "ruthlessly selective" review of the Swiss bank's businesses, amid expectations that the incoming CEO would cut staff by about 15 ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Newly appointed Credit Suisse AG Chief Executive Tidjane Thiam, in an interview with the Financial Times, promised a "ruthlessly selective" review of the Swiss bank's businesses, amid expectations that the incoming CEO would cut staff by about 15 percent from its investment banking arm.

headline.main: High-Ranking Mormon Church Figure Boyd Packer Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: High-Ranking Mormon Church Figure Boyd Packer Dies at 90

docs.snippet: Boyd Packer, head of the Mormon Church's highest governing body, died at his home in Salt Lake City on Friday, the church said on its website....
docs.lead_paragraph: Boyd Packer, head of the Mormon Church's highest governing body, died at his home in Salt Lake City on Friday, the church said on its website.

headline.main: Minnesota Burn Survivor Leaves Hospital After 264 Days
headline.print_headline: Minnesota Burn Survivor Leaves Hospital After 264 Days

docs.snippet: A Minnesota man who survived being badly burned in a lawnmower explosion was discharged Friday after 264 days in the hospital, but not before his caregivers gathered to say farewell to one of their favorite patients....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Minnesota man who survived being badly burned in a lawnmower explosion was discharged Friday after 264 days in the hospital, but not before his caregivers gathered to say farewell to one of their favorite patients.

headline.main: No Blatter, No Problem Say World Cup Organizers
headline.print_headline: No Blatter, No Problem Say World Cup Organizers

docs.snippet: Players do not care who hands out trophies and the absence of embattled FIFA president Sepp Blatter will not have any impact on the Women's World Cup final, organizers said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Players do not care who hands out trophies and the absence of embattled FIFA president Sepp Blatter will not have any impact on the Women's World Cup final, organizers said on Friday.

headline.main: Tomic Slams 'Disrespectful' Tennis Australia,' Actor' Rafter
headline.print_headline: Tomic Slams 'Disrespectful' Tennis Australia,' Actor' Rafter

docs.snippet: Bernard Tomic launched a blistering tirade against Tennis Australia and its head of performance Pat Rafter after his third round exit at Wimbledon on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bernard Tomic launched a blistering tirade against Tennis Australia and its head of performance Pat Rafter after his third round exit at Wimbledon on Friday.
